statements: SELECT * FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE arrival_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT route_id, route_name, departure_time FROM public_transportation_routes ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT route_name, end_location FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE start_location LIKE 'City%';
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '07:00:00' AND '10:00:00';
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE departure_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE arrival_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT route_id, route_name, departure_time FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE start_location LIKE '%Station%';
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE arrival_time BETWEEN '15:00:00' AND '18:00:00' ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE start_location != end_location;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedule WHERE route_id = 2 ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'New York';
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedule WHERE departure_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT routes.route_name, schedule.departure_time, schedule.arrival_time FROM routes INNER JOIN schedule ON routes.route_id = schedule.route_id;
SELECT * FROM BusStop ORDER BY stop_id ASC;
SELECT stop_name, latitude, longitude FROM BusStop WHERE latitude > 30;
SELECT route_name, start_stop_id, end_stop_id FROM BusRoute ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, arrival_time, departure_time FROM BusSchedule WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT stop_id, stop_name FROM BusStop WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT stop_name, latitude, longitude FROM BusStop WHERE stop_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_stop_id, end_stop_id FROM BusRoute WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, stop_id, arrival_time, departure_time FROM BusSchedule WHERE stop_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM BusStop ORDER BY stop_name DESC, latitude ASC;
SELECT route_name, start_stop_id, end_stop_id FROM BusRoute WHERE route_id > 2 AND start_stop_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE route_name LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT * FROM Schedules WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '10:00:00';
SELECT route_id, COUNT(*) as stop_count FROM Schedules GROUP BY route_id HAVING stop_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE start_location = 'City A';
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM Stops ORDER BY stop_name ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM Schedules WHERE route_id = 2 OR stop_id = 3;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, capacity FROM Vehicles WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT * FROM bus_stops;
SELECT stop_name, location_lat, location_long FROM bus_stops WHERE stop_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_stop, end_stop FROM bus_routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM bus_schedules WHERE departure_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT station_name, location_lat, location_long FROM train_stations WHERE station_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM bus_stops WHERE location_lat > 30.5 AND location_long < -100.75;
SELECT stop_id, stop_name FROM bus_stops WHERE stop_name LIKE 'Downtown%';
SELECT route_name, start_stop, end_stop FROM bus_routes WHERE route_id = 101 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM bus_schedules WHERE departure_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT station_name, location_lat, location_long FROM train_stations WHERE location_lat < 40.0 AND location_long > -120.0;
